data.eml:eml: New and little known pholcid spiders (Araneae: Pholcidae) from Laos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yao, Zhiyuan, Li, Shuqiang (2013): New and little known pholcid spiders (Araneae: Pholcidae) from Laos. Zootaxa 3709 (1): 1-51, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.1.1
